title: javadocs cleanup
description: basic cleanup in core/contrib: typos, apache license header as javadoc, missing periods that screw up package summary, etc.

comments.content:
note: i tried to leave UK versus US english spelling differences alone, there were a few cases though where you might notice i changed this.

This was only in the case where it was inconsistent in the same file, i.e. a method that spells it 'synchronization' in one sentence but 'synchronisation' in the next.
comments.author: Robert Muir

comments.content:
i'm the last person in the world that should be reviewing a spell correction patch – but nothing jumped out at me as being bad about the patch...
